content: in next chain space 4sc ch3 4sc in next chain space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch into first single_crochet border slip_stitch into next st ch1 single_crochet in same space *ch1 skip next 4sts working now in that little chain space > treble_crochet ch3 single_crochet on top of last st made twice treble_crochet ch2 double_crochet in top of last st made ch5 slip_stitch in top of last st made ch2 double_crochet in top of last st made ch3 single_crochet in top of last st made 3 times single_crochet on top of that last double_crochet you made 2sc around side of double_crochet slip_stitch ch5 slip_stitch in next st 2sc around side of next double_crochet slip_stitch into next st >> these next sts are going to go into the chain space you started all this in >> treble_crochet ch3 single_crochet on top of last st made twice treble_crochet in next chain space< ch1 skip next 5 sts single_crochet in next st repfrom*to*around joinwithaslsttofirstscofround fastenoff 3 for more snowflakes with skulls please look for my tree of skulls pattern set on ravelry and etsy www facebook com/wanamakerart/ ref=bookmarks www etsy com/shop/creativeworkbyannie ref=pr_shop_more www ravelry com/designers/ann-wanamaker www instagram com/annwanamaker/ special thanks goes to my testers jen bee yvette meador antionette kuhnert thank you from the bottom of my heart °* ˜˜ *° ☠ ❥♥ღღ♥❥☠ °* ˜˜ *° ann wanamaker
